metadata.title: AI Baby Dance Generator
metadata.description: Turn baby photos into dancing videos with AI. Make baby dance in seconds!

page.title: AI Baby Dance Generator
page.description: Turn baby photos into dancing videos with AI. Make baby dance in seconds!

generator.title: Create Dance Video
generator.description: Two simple steps: Upload photo + Select dance style

form.prompt_placeholder: Describe the dance moves, music style, or scene (e.g., baby doing hip-hop, cheerful birthday dance)
form.reference_image_placeholder: Click to upload or drag photo (JPG, PNG, WebP, max 10MB)
form.reference_video_placeholder: Enter a video URL to remix
form.some_images_failed_to_upload: Photo upload failed, please try again
form.prompt_too_long: Description is too long, please shorten it
form.public_toggle_desc: Allow others to view your generated video
form.pro_template_sign_in_first: Sign in to unlock Pro templates
form.pro_template_member_only: Pro templates are for members only. Please upgrade on the pricing page.
form.orientation_auto_switched_video: This template is longer than 10 seconds, so orientation was switched to Follow Video.
form.orientation_image_max_10s: Follow Photo supports templates up to 10 seconds. Please choose Follow Video.

generator.privacy_notice: ðŸ”’ Privacy: Your photos are encrypted and automatically deleted after processing. We never share your data with third parties.

status.queued: Queued. Your video will start soon.

errors.timeout_actionable: Generation timed out. Please try again, switch template, or choose 720p for faster results.
errors.empty_result_actionable: The model returned no video. Please retry or switch to another dance template.
errors.insufficient_credits_actionable: You don't have enough credits. Please top up and try again.
errors.provider_unavailable_actionable: Video provider is temporarily unavailable. Please retry in a moment.
errors.network_retry_actionable: Network is unstable. Please check your connection and retry.
errors.task_not_found_actionable: Task was not found. Please start a new generation.
errors.input_missing_actionable: Required inputs are missing. Please upload a photo and select a template, then retry.
errors.generic_retry_actionable: Generation failed. Please retry in a moment.

watermark.free_notice: Free exports include a dynamic BabyBoogey watermark. Upgrade to remove it.
watermark.download_failed: Your browser cannot export a watermarked video. Please try Chrome/Edge, or upgrade to remove the watermark.
watermark.preview_failed: Unable to prepare protected preview. Please try downloading or regenerate.
